mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note (user_id, content, images, like_count, comment_count, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, #{images}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT n.*, u.nickname as author_name, u.avatar as author_avatar FROM note n LEFT JOIN user u ON n.user_id = u.id WHERE n.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE note SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
